SA11bsa047_u:375: tadevaṃ cintāmayyā prajñayā niścitya bhūtamartha tasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāya bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām utpādayet /
SA11bsa047_u:381: tathā ca bhāvanāyāḥ parisphuṭajñānaphalatvena sāphalyamuktam āryasamādhirāje-
SA11bsa047_u:382: ārocayāmi prativedayāmi vo yathā yathā bahu ca vitarkayennaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:383: tathā tathā bhavati tannimittacittastehi vitarkehi tanniśritehi //
SA11bsa047_u:386: tatra prathamataraṃ tāvad yoginā śamatho niṣpādanīyaścittasthirīkaraṇāya /
SA11bsa047_u:389: na cāsamāhitena cetasā yathābhutaṃ śakyate jñātum /
SA11bsa047_u:390: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā- "samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:391: śamatho lābhādikāmanānirapekṣasya samyakpravṛttau sthirasya duḥkhādyadhivāsanaśilasyārabdhavīryasya śīghrataraṃ sampadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:392: ata eva āryasaṃdhinirvocanādau dānādaya uttarottaratvena varṇitāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:393_1: praṇāmādikaṃ kṛtvā pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ vidhāya sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo
SA11bsa047_u:393_2: mahākaruṇām evābhimukhīkṛtya kāyam ṛjuṃ praṇidhāya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya
SA11bsa047_u:394: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yad vastu vicārayitavyaṃ yāvatā prakāreṇa saṅkṣepataḥ sakalavastusaṅgraho bhavati tatra cittaṃ badhnīyat /
SA11bsa047_u:396: etaccādikarmikasya vikṣepadoṣaparihārārtha saṃkṣiptaṃ tāvad yuktam ālambayitum /
SA11bsa047_u:397: yadā tu jitamanaskāro bhavati tadā skandhadhātvādibhedena viśodhya vistaraśo 'pyālambata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:398: tathā sandhinirmocanādau yoginām aṣṭādaśaprakāraśūnyatālambanādibhedena nānāprakāram ālambanam uktam /
SA11bsa047_u:399: atraiva bhagavatā sattvānugrahād rūpyarūpyādibhedena saṃkṣepamadhyavistāraiḥ vastubhedo 'bhidharmādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:401: tato niścitya sarvaṃ vastusaṅgrahaṃ tatraiva punaścittaṃ prabandhena prerayet /
SA11bsa047_u:402: yada tvantarā rāgādinā cittaṃ bahirvikṣipet tadāvagamya vikṣepatām aśubhādibhāvanayā vikṣepam upaśāmya punastatraivoparyupari cittaṃ prerayet /
SA11bsa047_u:407_0: atha yadā styānamiddhābhibhavād āalambanagrahaṇāprakaṭatayālīnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā
SA11bsa047_u:408: atha yadā pūrvahasitaramitādyanusmarato 'ntarā cittam uddhataṃ paśyet,
SA11bsa047_u:411: atha yadā layauddhatyabhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhicittaṃ paśyet tadābhogaśithīlīkaraṇād [Bhk_183] upekṣate /
SA11bsa047_u:414: yadā tu tatrālambane 'nabhisaṃskāravāhi yāvadicchaṃ cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:420: ayaṃ ca śamathamārgo bhagavatā āryaprajñāpāramitādau nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:446: eṣa caiṣāṃ padānām arthaḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ maitreyeṇa ca vyākhyātaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:447: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvasaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:461: tathā hi- samādherguṇeṣvabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā tatra yogino 'bhilāṣa utpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:469: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:470: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadābhogadoṣaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:472: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgataḥ samādhiḥ paramakarmaṇyo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:474: ata evoktaṃ sūtra- "[aṣṭa]prahāṇa [saṃskāra]samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:475: eṣā ca cittaikāgratā uttarottarakarmaṇyatāsamprayogād ālambanādiguṇaviśeṣayogācca dhyānārūpisamāpattiḥ vimokṣādivyapadeśaṃ labhate /
SA11bsa047_u:476: tathā hi yadopekṣāvedanāsamprayuktā savitarkasavicārā sā bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:478: yadā ca kāmatṛṣṇayā pāpadharmaiśca] viviktā bhavati [vitarkavicāra]prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:481: yadā vitarkavicārarahitā prathamadhyānabhūmitṛṣṇayā viviktā ca bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:494: anyathā hi tīrthikānāmiva samādhimātreṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:496: kiñcāpi bhāvayet samādhimetaṃ na co bibhāveyya sā ātmasaṃjñām /
SA11bsa047_u:497: punaḥ prakupyati kileṣu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:504: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:505: tatrāyamarthaḥ- prathamaṃ yogī ye rūpiṇo dharmā bāhyārthatayā paraiḥ parikalpitāsteṣu tāvad vicārayet /
SA11bsa047_u:510: paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣa- māṇo yogī tān arthānna samanupaśyati /
SA11bsa047_u:511: tasyāsamanupaśyata evaṃ bhavati cittamātramevaitat sarvaṃ na punarbāhyo 'rthā vipadyate / tadevam-
SA11bsa047_u:517: tatra yaccittamātraṃ tadapyasati grāhye grāhako na yukto grāhakasya grāhyapekṣatvad tataścittaṃ grāhyagrāhakaviviktam advayameva cittamiti vicārayed advayalakṣaṇe-
SA11bsa047_u:521: evaṃ cittamātramatikramya tadapi dvayanirābhasaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatikrameta /
SA11bsa047_u:522: svataḥ parato bhāvānāṃ janmānupapatteḥ grāhyagrāhakayoścālīkatve tadavyatirekāt tasyāpi satyatvamayuktamiti vicārayet /
SA11bsa047_u:527: tathā cādvayajñānanirābhāse jñāne yadā sthito yogī tadā paramatattve sthitatvāt,
SA11bsa047_u:529: etadeva tat mahāyānam ucyate yat paramatattvadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:530: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:533: atredṛśamevādarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhānāmiva pratyayavaikalyād amanasikārato vā yadadarśanam /
SA11bsa047_u:535: tato bhāvābhiniveśadiviparyāsavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvād asaṃjñisamāpattyādivyutthitasyeva punarapi bhāvābhiniveśamūlasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyotpatteramukta eva yogī bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:538: tatrāpi prajñayā nirūpayato yo 'nupalambhaḥ sa tatrāmanasikāro 'bhipreto na manasikārābhāvamātram /
SA11bsa047_u:539: na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:540: saṃśayā prahāṇe tu na pūrvopalabdheṣu ca rūpādiṣvabhiniveśamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum agnyaparivarjane dāhāparivarjanavat /
SA11bsa047_u:541: tathāmī rūpādimithyāvikalpāḥ kaṇṭakādivadutkīlya na hastena cetaso 'panetavyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:543: tacca saṃśayabījaṃ yoginaḥ samādhyāloke sati prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatastesāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pūrvopalabdhānām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād,
SA11bsa047_u:546: tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā /
SA11bsa047_u:547: anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta /
SA11bsa047_u:548: tadanivṛttyā cā prahīṇatimiradoṣasyeva yo 'yukto 'līkarūpādyabhiniveśaḥ pravarteta na kenāpi nivartyeta /
SA11bsa047_u:549: tasmāt samādhihastena manaḥ sandhāya sūkṣmataraprajñāśastreṇa tatra cetasi rūpādimithyāvikalpabījam uddharet /
SA11bsa047_u:550: evam satyutkhātamūlā iva [Bhk_188] taravo bhūmernirmūlatayā mithyāvikalpāḥ punaścetasi na virohanti /
SA11bsa047_u:551: ata evāvaraṇaprahāṇāya śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:554: śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya samādhilābhāḥ samādhilābhācca hi prajñābhāvanā /
SA11bsa047_u:555: prajñayā jñānaṃ bhavati viśuddhaṃ viśuddhajñānasya hi śīlasampat // iti /
SA11bsa047_u:556: tathā hi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā prajñayā vicārayataḥ samyagjñānāloka utpadyate,
SA11bsa047_u:561: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūla eva bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:562: na tu viruddhastasmāt syāt samāhitasya prajñayā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalambhaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:567: tathā hi yadā prajñayā nirūpayan na kiñcid bhāvasvabhāvam upalabhate yogī,
SA11bsa047_u:572: yadā tu kālatraye 'pi bhāvo yoginā prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatā nopalabdhaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:574: evamanye 'pi vikalpāstadā tasya na samutpadyanta eva bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ [Bhk_189] sarvavikalpasya vyāptatvāt /
SA11bsa047_u:577: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:578: tathā hi kleśāvaraṇasyānutpannāniruddhabhāveṣu bhāvādiviparyāso mūlaṃ kāraṇam āryasatyadvayanirdeśādau varṇitaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:579: anena ca yogābhyāsena sarvabhāvādivikalpānāṃ prahāṇāt sakalabhāvādiviparyāsasyāvidyāsvabhāvasya kleśāvaraṇamūlasya prahāṇam /
SA11bsa047_u:595: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:596: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:597: yāvat paramārthato nirvāṇadṛṣṭisarva dṛṣṭiparyutthānam api na bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:598: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃ vinītā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:601: kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato 'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittāt prajānāti,
SA11bsa047_u:608: ya kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti /
SA11bsa047_u:611: āha- yāvad eṣā paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā idaṃ kleśānāṃ gotram" iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:613: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
SA11bsa047_u:615: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:617: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati /
SA11bsa047_u:619: acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet /
SA11bsa047_u:620: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:621: ato 'yam evāvaraṇaprahāṇo sarvajñatvādhigame ca paramo mārgaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:622: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:623: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre- "anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvānirvāṇe 'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:628: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:631: na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati,
SA11bsa047_u:641: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā? ityāha-
SA11bsa047_u:644: tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta,
SA11bsa047_u:645: yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne 'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti /
SA11bsa047_u:647: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāsena paśyati / iti /
SA11bsa047_u:648: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī /
SA11bsa047_u:656: kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti /
SA11bsa047_u:657: tathātrāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti /
SA11bsa047_u:658: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam /
SA11bsa047_u:659: tathā coktam āryasatyadvayanirdeśe- "paramārthato 'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛttyā ca mārga bhāvayati" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:661: kintu yasya saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyāpi notpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:663: yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato 'līko 'pi samutpadyata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:665: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:668: tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta,
SA11bsa047_u:669: tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:678: te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante,
SA11bsa047_u:680: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham /
SA11bsa047_u:683: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA11bsa047_u:687: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet /
SA11bsa047_u:688: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:690: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:691: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:692: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:693: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- "kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati?
SA11bsa047_u:700: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
SA11bsa047_u:703: ayaṃ ca paramārthato 'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena" iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:704: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu [Bhk_194] viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:705: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti /
SA11bsa047_u:708: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau- "yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:709: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ nispādayitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:710: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:711: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane 'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti /
SA11bsa047_u:712: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante /
SA11bsa047_u:718: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati" iti /
SA11bsa047_u:727: sā mayā [Bhk_195] pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /
SA11bsa047_u:728: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:729: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:731: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti /
SA11bsa047_u:732: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate /
